title: Opinion: I was a Moderna exec when the Covid vaccine rolled out. That spirit of possibility is no more
description: “The pharmaceutical industry is not the enemy,” writes Richard Hughes IV, who was Moderna’s VP for public policy when the Covid vaccine rolled out.
content: “The pharmaceutical industry is not the enemy,” writes Richard Hughes IV, who was Moderna’s VP for public policy when the Covid vaccine rolled out.
